author: Xerbutri
description: Willem van Oranje College, secondary school, Waalwijk
realname: Willem van Oranje College, secondary school, Waalwijk
title: Willem College
intro: When I was a boy I used to go to school here. A few years ago I heard that the school would move to another building and there were no clear plans what to do with the old building, so in june 2007 I took my chance and visited the place. It is funny to see all the classrooms where I studied a long time ago.
history: Around 1950 this school was established. In 2006 they moved to a new building and the old one was abandoned.
